NHS Guide for open data in health
story: Tom Shih shared a link to the group: g0v.tw 後勤中心.
description: 此為大綱及翻譯 *Source : http://thegovlab.org/nhs/ *Forward *Evidence suggests that giving patients access to their own healthcare records can increase healthy behavior and improve decision-making.
name: THE OPEN DATA ERA IN HEALTH AND SOCIAL CARE
